name: AC Dashboard
description:
Support for AC 1.16.2
AC Remote Dash, is a Virtual Dashboard for Assetto Corsa. You can see all the stats provided from Assetto Corsa in your phone or iPad , like gear, rpm, lap time, dirty level on tyres dcc... in Real Time.

You dont need a client in your PC, this app works STANDALONE. Just put your internal Assetto Corsa PC lan ip in the app configuration

If you have any trouble on connection PLEASE, contact me, the problem is 100% of the time on your PC, check antivirus and firewall!
